context.rdfs:comment: Instructions that explain how to achieve a result by performing a sequence of steps.
context.rdfs:label: HowTo

properties.rdfs:comment: A single step item (as HowToStep, text, document, video, etc.) or a HowToSection.
properties.rdfs:label: step

properties.rdfs:comment: The quantity that results by performing instructions. For example, a paper airplane, 10 personalized candles.
properties.rdfs:label: yield
